remarks: Continuity of a function at a point in terms of filter limits. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 7-Sep-2009.)  (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 7-Aug-2015.)
statement:
cnpflf $p |- ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ K e. ( TopOn ` Y ) /\ A e. X ) -> ( F e. ( ( J CnP K ) ` A ) <-> ( F : X --> Y /\ A. f e. ( Fil ` X ) ( A e. ( J fLim f ) -> ( F ` A ) e. ( ( K fLimf f ) ` F ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d A f $.
$d F f $.
$d J f $.
$d K f $.
$d X f $.
$d Y f $.
